title: Grilled lobster with tomato soup
ingredients: ['2 large lobsters', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1kg fresh tomatoes, chopped', '1 stick celery, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '1L fish stock', '1 bay leaf', '1 pinch salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon sugar', '100ml milk', '20g chopped parsley']
